Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class SFOP::CImageFactory< T >

Class implementing a templated specific factory for creating instances of CImage.

An arbitrary number of factories can be created, e.g. one for each device or specialization.

Warning:
There may arise incompatibilities when the same device is used for several factories. CImageCpu is fine, but CImageCL causes problems when using different OpenCL kernels concurrently on the same device.
